properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 3:04PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the
following rivers in Mississippi...

Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Big Black River At West.
* until further notice.
* At  2:45 PM Wednesday the stage was 19.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Forecast...Heavy rainfall above the river gage yesterday afternoon
has produced a strong rise and a crest near 21 feet on Saturday
evening.
* Impact...At 21.0 feet...Extensive flooding of agricultural land.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 48 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.

NWSheadline: Forecast flooding increased from Minor to Moderate severity
